text:
MEMORANDUM
January 2, 1958
To: Harry J. Skornia
From: Burton Paulu
Would you please attach to each of these the final list
of Research Commi11ee.members? We've talked about the
membership so much I'm not sure of all the names, and I do
not want to embarrass Sam by giving him the wrong names.
(In fact, it might be good to send me a carbon of the
full committee lists when the Newsletter goes to the printer.)
BP:ds
